Comment: Here starts the great match (the 4th one, but still) between me, and Utku, or goflb, as his nick goes.
Denying the Sicilian Defence's more aggressive variants is both unexpected, and little known by many players, so here it goes.

An unexpected defence maneuver that lets me defend more, but I choose unwisely, and try to break the pin...

But he gets greedy, and wasted the match with a single blunder. Ouch.
The knight is un-takeable, for the pin by rook on queen is deadly.
Oops, the knight has escaped, now black has little chance, or does he?

A pin most unwanted costs white a queen, but with attack on it's back too.

Brave sacrifice of the queen, as the king will be in too bad of a position to be defended, with the h8 rook sitting still.

Greed hurts, he's leaving his queen even more open to the attacks by rooks, and leaving his queen in crossfire.
Uncheckable place that doesn't block the rooks, perfect.
Biggest blunder in the match, unfixable too, ...Ka8 would play longer, and possibly win too.
